help.title: Login Help
help.content: Welcome to the BlueCallom World. If you have already an account you login with LinkedIn to get access to GPTBlue. In case you don't have an account, you still click on 'Login with LinkedIn' and we create automatically an account for you. The login with email is for corporate users whereas the company holds the account management for the respective users.

by_continuing.content: By continuing, you agree to our

forgot_password.tooltip: You will receive an email to change your password. Your email is the email you registered with or the default email your social network is linked to.

help.title: Forgot Password Help
help.content:
If you've forgotten your password, don't worry! We're here to help you regain access to your account. Please follow these simple steps:
Enter Your Email Address: In the field below, enter the email address associated with your account. We'll send you a link to reset your password.
Check Your Inbox: After submitting your email address, please check your email inbox (and spam/junk folder) for a message from us. This email will contain a link or instructions for resetting your password.
Follow the Instructions: Click on the link provided in the email or follow the instructions to reset your password. Make sure to create a strong, unique password to enhance the security of your account.

help.content: See the response from the AI and review it carefully. We suggest you make about 10 or more test runs with different user inputs to see how effective your prompt is.

download.success_msg: Prompt successfully entered into your personal library

help.title: Prompt Execution Help
help.content: All GPTBlue-generated prompts show you how much time you gain, no matter whether in business hobby, personal or elsewhere. wenn delegating tasks to an AI.

help.title: GPTBlue IO AI Response Help
help.content: Here is the response from the Generative-AI. Please review it before you use it. The old rule 'Garbage in, Garbage out' is more important than ever before. The BlueCallom Prompt Framing Technology helps to frame every prompt in a way that is most accurate and helpful. Yet we all had communication challenges since thousands of years and now we are just in the beginning to overcome that deficiency.

help.title: My Applications Help
help.content:
Welcome to the BlueCallom World.
On this AI-Glazz, this is how we call the elements, you find all applications that you have access to or request access.
GPTBlue IO is your AI-Workspace, where you can run all the prompts you added to your personal library.
GPTBlue DID is your Development, Test, and Deploy space in case you want to create your own professional prompts.
My Settings is where you setup your profile, manage your CallomCoins, the currency in the BlueCallom world.
Partner Portal is for our Business Partners who want to create and sell prompts on BlueCallom
Corporate Portal is for corporations who run BlueCallom as their AI network

home.time_tooltip: Workplace productivity is often referred to as how much work is accomplished over a particular period of time. We want you to enjoy the extra time you can gain with more interesting work.

icons_tooltips.download: Load it into your personal library.
icons_tooltips.dna: Show the short prompt description the Author wrote. (It will be the description of the prompt - come from DB)
icons_tooltips.star: Show the average star rating from USERS and the number of ratings
icons_tooltips.like: Show the number of likes who saw the prompt but may not have used it yet.
icons_tooltips.share: Share this prompt with friends or publicly online

prompt.personal_library_empty:
Your prompt Library is empty Visit the 'BlueCallom Exchange' and load some prompts here.
OR
If you want to create your own, Go to the GPTBlue DTD. This Is the Prompt Designer for you to Develop-Test-Deploy prompts
prompt.org_library_empty: Your organization's prompt library is empty. You can deploy your prompt to the organization library, and after approval by the library owner, it will be listed here.

prompt.icon_like_tooltip: You help the author to know that this prompt worked out for you
prompt.icon_dislike_tooltip: You help the author to know that this prompt has not worked out for you
prompt.icon_comment_tooltip: Give feedback directly to prompt authors. Remember they continuously maintain and improve their prompts and that is why pay per use will build by far the best prompts over time :)

prompt.icon_pdf_tooltip: You help the author to know that this prompt worked out for you
prompt.btn_save_tooltip: Save your content to store the content you have composed so far. IN the near future we will have an'auto save' feature with the option to manually save it.

help.title: Prompt object list help
help.content: The various prompt objects will be fused to one prompt. Individually they help you frame a specific task or request. The more precise your prompt is crafted the better the outcome. Like when you negotiate a big deal, selecting carefully every word makes the difference.

clock.tooltip: Workplace productivity is often referred to as how much work is accomplished over a particular period of time. We want you to enjoy the extra time yoy can gain with more interesting work.

prompt.analytics_fetch_error: Error fetching Analytics, Please refresh the page.
prompt.askgpt_required: Please enter prompt to get GPTBlue response.
prompt.prompt_productivity_tooltip: The GPTBlue 'Prompt Productivity Gain' PPG shows you the productivity gain over manual work The PPG is X times of manual work.

validation_msg.maxlength: Please enter not more than 8 characters.

prompt.prompt_select: Please select a prompt from your library
prompt.task_details_descriptiom: The Pre-Prompt serves as the initial context-setter in your prompt and is vital for framing discussions within an innovation project. It provides the AI with background information, setting the stage for more focused responses.
prompt.iterative_task_description: Share Your Project Easily: We've made collaboration simple. Your GPTBlue project has a unique public URL that you can share with anyone. They can access your project without the need for a login.
prompt.default_action_description: The 'User Default Prompt' is used primarily for testing prompt framing and evaluating the responses generated by GPTBlue system. It simulates the user's input, allowing you to see how the AI responds to specific queries or statements.
prompt.output_format_description: The Post-Prompt offers additional context or instructions to guide the GPTBlue's response. It helps refine the GPTBlue's understanding and ensures it generates responses aligned with the project's goals.
prompt.click_AskGPTBlue_msg2: Please click on the 'Ask' button to Ask the massive AI that aggregated most of humanities knowledge
prompt.actor_persona_description: The Actor Definition specifies the perspective or role from which the AI should respond. It's especially useful in innovation projects with diverse team members, enabling tailored responses.
prompt.iterative_post_prompt_format_description: An AI-generated response will be inserted for the iterative prompt
prompt.eContext_description: Provide some background information about the situation the prompt will be used for. Keep in mind many paths lead to Rome but with an AI we are talking about a trillion paths. Provide related locations, materials, or processes within the situation you are working in. You may want to use this file to describe your business, related to the task you want to perform.
prompt.echescription_description: Write down the specific challenge or function a user should perform. If you have specific data, terms, facts, Times. you may need to use it as a variable
prompt.dhandling_description: Provide data you are using and treat them like a variable by putting the name into 'variable_name' Make the variable a unique name without killing its meaning. Here you may also restrict the size of the response. For instance: 'Write an 850-word response'
prompt.gptblueObjective_description: Define the task objectives. This may be to get a plan example, write a post, or validate a plan you provided. Help the AI to recognize how it could best respond to your request
prompt.audience_description: There is a high likelihood that your interaction is about any type of target audience, may it be customers, partners, or other stakeholders. Your audience may well be your internal teams or the whole organization.
prompt.writingstyle_description: You may want to give GPT Blue a writing style by saying: 'write casually': You may also use this to set a 'heat. level between 0.2 and 1.0. ).2 would mean very factual, detailed, and emotionless. Good for legal responses.  1.0 is a very bloomy language for storytelling.
prompt.timeline_description: Inject time-related prompt objects and manage priorities.Allowing the AI generate results with time-based priorities to alleviate bottlenecks
prompt.references_description: Use this field when you want to add dedicated references to the result.
prompt.prompt_exection_title: Let the prompt work for you
prompt.prompt_exection_subtitle: Social media engagement prompt Post Integration inspiration

help.title: My PromptLibrary Help
help.content:
Your personal Prompt Library. You have 3 tabs:
Tab 1 New, Business, Community, Personal, Custom
Tab 2 Is defined by the selection of Tab 1
For New: this is just a list of new prompts coming in from various sources
For Business: Sales, marketing, R&D, Finance, HR…
For Community: Clubs, Organizations, Religion, Sport, Gov, Education…
For Personal: Family, Hobby, Interests, Home, Career, Health, Various…
For Custom: Custom categories…
Tab 3 Are subcategories where you are storing store your prompts
When activating the settings function on the bottom, You see all available options that you can add in each tab. We uggest you use only the ones you need right now. You can always add tabs and create your own.

modal.title: Create Referral Key
modal.content:
1) DON’T LOOSE YOUR REWARD
Please enter a Referral ID, that you may have received BEFORE you create your own. Otherwise you will loose the reward that would be given to you as a new user. If so ABORT this screen!

2) CREATE YOUR REFERRAL KEY
If you have not been referred, CONTINUE and create your referral Key. Share it with Friends and contacts who may be interested in exploring the fantastic world of Generative-AI and what Blueallom makes out of it.

For every new user who registered you will get CC 10,000 as reward which you can Use to execute professional prompts.

help.title: Prompt Framing Controls Help
help.content: The Prompt Framing Controls help you to manage the prompt objects and the prompt itself. You can freeze, unfreeze, share, deploy, duplicate, version, history, and delete the prompt.

help.title: Prompt Framing Designer Help
help.content: Here you enter the name and the description of the prompt. Both are NOT USED when processing the prompt. But both are vital for the Prompt library to find or review the function of the prompt.

help.title: Prompt Library Help
help.content:
The unique Prompt Framing Modeler is helping innovation teams in hundreds of situations and innovation specific tasks. 
Innovation teams don't need to become prompt engineers and enter their prompts strait into GPTBlue. 
While todays prompting techniques are pretty rudimentary, GPTBlue already handles conditional prompt outputs, supports custom instructions, 
prompt governance, and direct function calling. Think of Prompt Framing as a new programing language to model the human-to-AI interface for very business 
or organization specific interaction with an otherwise very general AI.

duplicate_prompt.tooltip: If you want to freeze a prompt because you don't want to touch it by accident, simply create a copy to develop it further, or make a copy as archive and develop the prompt further that is already out in the market.

version_prompt.label: Version
version_prompt.tooltip: This is an important feature for pro developers. Based on our own experience it happens rather often that a prompt you wrote 5 versions ago was the most effective. But if it is overwritten it is cone. This is why we developed the versioning tool.

history_prompt.label: History

help.title: Custom model Help
help.content: A custom model is typically created from a document that may contain several hundred pages. It uses the 'embeds' function to automatically train the added model.

function_call.label: Function Call
function_call.tooltip: Allows prompts access functions inside or outside GPTBlue

help.title: Function Call Help
help.content: A function is typically a code written in C++, ColdFusion or Python, allowing to access specific APIs, Databases, or other functions like machine controllers and more. The code can be uploaded into BlueCallom and executed when the function is called. For security purposes those functions run on custom dedicated services and will be individually reviewed. A corporate account is needed to upload such a function call.

iterative.label: Iterative
iterative.tooltip: Allows prompts runs in multiple phases and allows editing inside the results

help.title: Iterative Help
help.content:
This 'BluePrompt' is a unique feature of GPTBlue.

1) When you create an iterative Prompt you assume that you want the AI to give you first a suggestion and then you complete the suggestion with your own idea.

2) This is why there is a Pre-Prompt-Task (you ask for guidance) and a post-prompt-task (You complete the result that the AI returned from the request for guidance)

3) Example: PRE-Prompt-Task: "Create a template for my social media plan as described above (You have your thoughts in the objectives)" Once you execute the prompt you will see a template that is already pretty good.. POST-Prompt-Task: "I edited your template. Please review and make some additional suggestions" Now you ran this very same prompt further (a second execution). The AI will now review your changes and make additional suggestions. It helps to perfect the outcome with your own human intelligence. This is by the way a superb example for "Human Intelligence Augmentation".

open_source.label: Open Source
open_source.tooltip: When shared, users can create a copy and see all the details behind the prompt

help.title: Open Source Help
help.content: This means that the stand prompt is always invisible to its users. It would only confuse. If they need the full prompt the author must decide to make it available as such. To the contrary, for educational purposes, prompts mus also be available as source       code. Also in some business cases users may need to adjust prompts and can do that when it is provided as open source.

help.title: Advanced Prompt Class Help
help.content:
It helps you to start with easy prompts and advance over time or when needed. When switching from Standard, to Advanced, to Expert the user sees more and more features that require some more knowledge about the system

a) Standard shows four standard prompt objects: Actor | Environment | Challenge | Task | Default Action

b) Advances shows additionally: Objective | Audience | Writing Style | Output Format References

c) Expert shows all above plus : Data Handling | Iterative Tasks | Function Call | Custom Model Access

company_detail.not_accepted_domain:
is not accepted company domain for account association.
If you want to connect with your company account, you need to provide website of your company.
company_detail.unmatched_email_company_domain: Your profile is not connected with your company. To get connected, make sure your business email domain matches with your company website domain.

freeze_prompt_label.label: Freeze
freeze_prompt_label.tooltip: In the Freeze mode a prompt can no longer be edited until you unfreeze

help.title: Freeze Prompt Help
help.content: It freezes a prompt so that it can no longer be changed. This is important when sharing the prompt to collaborate with others. When the original Author "Freezes" the         prompt no more changes can be done. The Author has to click again to "unfreeze" and edit it.

unfreeze_prompt_label.label: Unfreeze
unfreeze_prompt_label.tooltip: Revert prompt to editable mode. Click to unfreeze and resume editing.

help.title: Unfreeze Prompt Help
help.content: The Unfreeze icon allows the author to undo the freezing of a prompt, enabling further editing. Once unfrozen, modifications can be made to the prompt as needed. Clicking the Unfreeze icon releases the prompt from its frozen state, allowing for collaborative editing to resume.

most_used.label: Most Used Prompts by the community

most_productive.label: Most Productive by average aggregated PPG (Prompt Productivity Gain)

ref_id.label: Your Referral Id
ref_id.tooltip: Use your referral key to invite "Friends and Colleagues" and earn additional CC

simple.label: Simple
simple.tooltip: Click here to show simple mode

help.title: Share Prompt Help
help.content:
The share button allows you to share a prompt with the following
* People from within your company
* Users you have been invited by

total_cc_used.label: CC Used
total_cc_used.tooltip: CC used to generate the image

Welcome to GPTBlue a professional, high-productive Gen-AI solution.

You maybe able to run the prompt once. If you register, you get 10,000 CallomCoins to run or develop approximately 30 professional high-productivity prompts.
